column5: 3500 Sq. ft property is conveniently located 25 minutes from the RiverWalk, Six Flags Fiesta Texas and SeaWorld! In addition to 4 Bedrooms, 2 ½ baths, kitchen, game, family & dinning rooms, this spacious house has a Pool, 2 Story Deck, BBQ grill, Smart TV, Pool Table, Bar, Playground Set and ½ acre of land. Perfect to vacation with family and friends.
column8: Spacious 2Story Home, Pool Deck 10min from Airport
